title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How well do you know EC2? (CMP356)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 你对 EC2 了解多少？(CMP356)
abstract: Many organizations deploy Amazon EC2 instances without fully leveraging available optimization opportunities. EC2 offers over 850 instance types across six categories: general purpose, compute optimized, memory optimized, storage optimized, accelerated computing, and high-performance computing. Most instances run on the AWS Nitro System, which delivers enhanced performance through dedicated hardware for compute, storage, and networking functions. This session explores EC2's breadth, from processor architectures including Intel, AMD, and AWS Graviton processors that deliver up to 40% better price performance, to purchase options like Spot Instances offering up to 90% savings and Savings Plans for predictable workloads. Discover practical strategies for matching workloads to optimal instance configurations and purchasing models.
abstract_cn: 许多组织在部署 Amazon EC2 实例时未能充分利用可用的优化机会。EC2 提供超过 850 种实例类型，涵盖六个类别：通用型、计算优化型、内存优化型、存储优化型、加速计算型和高性能计算型。大多数实例运行在 AWS Nitro System 上，该系统通过专用硬件为计算、存储和网络功能提供增强的性能。本次会议探讨 EC2 的广度，从包括 Intel、AMD 和 AWS Graviton 处理器在内的处理器架构（可提供高达 40% 的性价比提升），到购买选项，如可节省高达 90% 成本的 Spot 实例以及适用于可预测工作负载的 Savings Plans。了解将工作负载与最佳实例配置和购买模式相匹配的实用策略。
